sentences.en: ...homes that house up to nine people.
sentences.cn: …最多可容纳9人的住处。

sentences.en: a famous Italian fashion house
sentences.cn: 一家著名的意大利时装公司

sentences.en: a four-bedroom house
sentences.cn: 一幢有四间卧室的房子

sentences.en: a small independent software house
sentences.cn: 一家小型的独立软件公司

sentences.en: America’s oldest publishing house
sentences.cn: 美国历史最悠久的出版社

sentences.en: an auction house
sentences.cn: 一家拍卖行

sentences.en: food and drinks on the house.
sentences.cn: 免费的食物及饮料

sentences.en: Harry inherited the house and a sizeable chunk of land.
sentences.cn: 哈里继承了这座房子以及相当大的一片土地。

sentences.en: His house was the only settled home I had as a child.
sentences.cn: 他的房子是我儿时唯一固定的家。

sentences.en: I gave her a lift back out to her house.
sentences.cn: 我让她搭我的便车回家。

sentences.en: It's really an amazing dance. It just always brings the house down.
sentences.cn: 这真是一段精彩绝伦的舞蹈表演，每次总是博得全场喝彩。

sentences.en: On Sunday Cohen lay around the house all day.
sentences.cn: 科恩星期天一整天都在家无所事事。

sentences.en: ran away like a house on fire; tickets that sold like a house afire.
sentences.cn: 匆忙逃跑；电影票顷刻间销售一空

sentences.en: some people sell house and home to sit in a boat writing books.
sentences.cn: 有些人卖掉自己的房子，坐在船上写书。

sentences.en: the Americans need to get their own economic house in order.
sentences.cn: 美国人需要对自己的经济做必要的改革。

sentences.en: The crowd in Robinson's Coffee-House was thinning, but only by degrees.
sentences.cn: 鲁宾逊咖啡屋里的人正在变少，但也只是渐少而已。

sentences.en: The house allocated to them was pleasant and spacious, and well-staffed.
sentences.cn: 分配给他们的房子舒适宽敞，并配齐了工作人员。

sentences.en: The house seemed muted, hushed as if it had been deserted.
sentences.cn: 房子里似乎悄然无声，安静得好像已经没人在住一样。

sentences.en: The house was large and full of art treasures.
sentences.cn: 房子很大，里面摆满了艺术珍品。

sentences.en: The path serves as an approach to the boat house.
sentences.cn: 这条小路通往船屋。

sentences.en: The president will address both houses of Congress.
sentences.cn: 总统将向参众两院发表讲话。

sentences.en: The sale is a big coup for the auction house.
sentences.cn: 这笔交易是该拍卖行的一大成功之举。

sentences.en: the speaker of the house
sentences.cn: 议会议长

sentences.en: There have been grouses about the economy, interest rates and house prices.
sentences.cn: 人们对经济、利率和房价啧有烦言。

sentences.en: There were few dry eyes in the house when I finished.
sentences.cn: 我说完后房间里没几个人不掉泪的。

sentences.en: They would have liked bare wooden floors throughout the house.
sentences.cn: 他们本想在整个房间的木地板上都不铺地毯的。

sentences.en: We post up a set of rules for the house.
sentences.cn: 我们张贴了一份房屋生活守则。

sentences.en: Why don’t you all come over to our house for coffee?
sentences.cn: 你们全都上我们家来喝咖啡如何？

words.tran_cn: 覆盖；给…房子住；把…储藏在房内

phrases.tran_cn: (谚)开裂的房屋撑不了多久；内部纷争，外患无穷
大扫除；内部清洗；整顿组织

phrases.phrase: get on (或 along) like a house on fire

phrases.tran_cn: 温室，花房；陶瓷生坯存放室
（为打牌而建的不稳固的房屋）牌房
(英)（下议院）有足够的法定人数出席

phrases.phrase: like a house on fire 或 like a house afire 【非正式用语】

phrases.tran_cn: 由设立的机构出资的；免费的

phrases.phrase: put (或set 或get) one's house in order

phrases.tran_cn: n. 白宫（美国政府的行政机关，美国总统官邸）

trans.tran_cn: 房屋，全家人，（从事某种生意的）公司，（英国）下议院
trans.tran_en: a group of people who make the laws of a country
a building that someone lives in, especially one that has more than one level and is intended to be used by one family
to provide someone with a place to live
